A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately this is the worst movie in the entire franchise. JJ set up a number of interesting  and exciting questions in Episode VII\, and Johnson answered them in the most uninspired\, and disappointing way possible\, that makes you think he either hates Star Wars\, doesn't understand it\, or simply doesn't give a damn. He ruins the character of Luke Skywalker\, and Mark Hamill is too much of a gentleman to come out and say that directly\, but if you hear his interviews\, he sure as hell believes it to be the case. Let's hope the Johnson trilogy never sees the light of day.
